item.description:
A wine and food tasting sponsored by Wiersma Insurance and The Back Door will be helping fund the Peace of Bread Community Kitchen in Whitinsville, MA. This marks the 7th year the friends of the Peace of Bread have come together to help feed the hungry in the Blackstone Valley. Join us for food, wine and a wonderful evening in the plaza of the Alternative's Mill. Friendly Discount Liquors will be providing a wine and beer tasting from 5-7 PM, along with food from all our favorite restaurants in the Blackstone Valley.

Everyone is invited to this free event. The first 100 people to donate $10 or more will receive a gift bag full of donations from businesses around the area.

Location:
Alternativesâ€™ Community Plaza
50 Douglas Road
Whitinsville
item.name: Cocktail Party for Charity
